overview: After discovering that her stepdaughter is a lesbian, Veronica gets caught up in the memory of a steamy affair she once had with a woman. Aidra's attraction to her stepmother, Nikki escalates when she's asked to provide her with massages in exchange for rent. A woman leading a secret life as a dominatrix asks her obedient stepdaughter to become her sub. Concerned that her stepdaughter hasn't experienced enough sex before marriage, Cherie sets out to give her a proper education the morning of the wedding.
title: A Mother Daughter Thing 2
